response.text: What is the S.H.I.E.L.D. priority database?

line.text: %WEASEL%: That's where data for all the super secret projects is kept. I've never hacked it before, but I've always wanted to.
%WEASEL%: Oh, yeah. The S.H.I.E.L.D. priority database is like one of the holy grails of hacking.

response.text: Who are these two hackers you're looking to meet?

line.text: %WEASEL%: They are the crème de la crème of computer geeks. C.B. and Beroge are the only two guys who've made their way into S.H.I.E.L.D. files... well, and lived to tell about it.

response.text: %PLAYER%: But you're not sure you can trust them?

line.text: %WEASEL%: I'd like to think there's honor amongst thieves, but... either one of those guys could turn me in just for the fun of it.

response.text: I know which hacker you should talk to.

line.text: %WEASEL%: It's not like I got something better to do.
